text: int main ( ) { int t , r , i , j , k , sum , max ; int array [ 105 ] [ 105 ] ; int tarray [ 105 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & array [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { for ( j = i + 1 ; j < r ; j ++ ) { array [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } k = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { j = 0 ; sum = 0 ; while ( j < r ) { sum = sum + array [ j ] [ i ] ; j ++ ; } tarray [ k ] = sum ; k ++ ; } max = tarray [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { if ( tarray [ i ] > max ) { max = tarray [ i ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
